hpa.disabled.fedManagedSelectTooltip: Cannot create resources for federal projects in cluster management, please go to the federal project page for operations.
hpa.disabled.tooltip: Each workload only supports binding to the same type of elastic scaling policy.
hpa.menu.parent.title: Elastic Scaling
hpa.validation.name.pattern: Name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens (-), must start and end with lowercase letter or number, maximum 63 characters.
hpa.validation.metrics.required: Please fill in at least one metric value
hpa.common.name: Name
hpa.common.name.help: Name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens (-), must start and end with lowercase letter or number, maximum 63 characters.
hpa.common.description.help: Description can contain any characters, maximum 256 characters.
hpa.common.aliasName.help: Alias can contain any characters, maximum 63 characters.
hpa.common.project.help: Select the project where the resource will be created.
hpa.common.creator: Creator
hpa.hpaSetTip: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler policy has been set.
hpa.customScalingSetTip: Event-driven scaling policy has been set.
hpa.vpaSetTip: Vertical Pod Autoscaler policy has been set.
hpa.empty.title: No Horizontal Pod Autoscaler Found
hpa.empty.description: Please create a Horizontal Pod Autoscaler.
hpa.title: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler
hpa.description: Only displays Horizontal Pod Autoscaler policies bound to current workload resources
hpa.minimumReplicas.help: Set the minimum allowed number of pod replicas, default value is 1.
hpa.maximumReplicas.help: Set the maximum allowed number of pod replicas, default value is 1.
hpa.modal.create.title: Create Horizontal Pod Autoscaler
hpa.scaleTarget.create.title: Add Workload
hpa.scaleTarget.create.description: Set deployments and statefulsets as scaling targets.
hpa.scaleTarget.create.info: Each workload only supports binding to the same type of elastic scaling policy.
hpa.metrics.title: Metrics Settings
hpa.metrics.description: Set at least one metric (CPU or Memory). If multiple metric rules are specified, the system will calculate the scaled replica count for each metric separately and select the maximum value for scaling.
hpa.advanceSettings.title: Scaling Behavior
hpa.advanceSettings.description: Configure scaling behavior for target resources in both scale-up and scale-down directions.
hpa.advanceSettings.scaleUp.title: Scale Up Policy
hpa.advanceSettings.scaleDown.title: Scale Down Policy
hpa.advanceSettings.policyPreference.hel: The scaler will adopt corresponding strategies based on your preferences in different situations.
hpa.advanceSettings.stabilizationWindowS: When scaling metrics fluctuate constantly, the stabilization window is used to limit replica count fluctuations.
hpa.scaleTarget.status.ableToScale.descr: Whether new scaling operations are allowed
hpa.scaleTarget.status.scalingActive.des: Whether valid metrics are successfully obtained and desired replica count calculated
hpa.scaleTarget.status.scalingLimited.de: Whether desired replica count is limited by minimum or maximum replicas.
